author: @souravsaha6757
text: Krish u explain in an awesome way but Formula for FPR and FNR is wrong ! Formula for FPR is (FP/N) i.e. FPR=FP/(TN+FP) and formula for FNR is (FN/P) i.e. FNR = FN/(TP+FN)
